author: andyh
msg: Change encoding specification from US-ASCII to ISO-8859-1.  European
versions of IE5 do not recognize US-ASCII.

author: jpolast
msg: fixes for when 'namespaces' feature is turned off:
* namespaces-prefixes only used when namespaces is on
* URIs not looked up when namespaces is off, blank string instead
* default validation scheme is validation on, auto-validation off.
